verses.text: \w Children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w right|strong="G1342"\w*.

\w Honour|strong="G5091"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*; (\w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*;)

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* it may \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w well|strong="G2095"\w* with \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thou \w mayest|strong="G2071"\w* live \w long|strong="G3118"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w ye|strong="G3588"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, \w provoke|strong="G3949"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* to \w wrath|strong="G3949"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w bring|strong="G1625"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1625"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w nurture|strong="G3809"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w admonition|strong="G3559"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Servants|strong="G1401"\w*, be obedient \w to|strong="G5219"\w* them that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \add your\add* \w masters|strong="G2962"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w trembling|strong="G5156"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w singleness|strong="G0572"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unto \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* \w with|strong="G2596"\w* \w eyeservice|strong="G3787"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w menpleasers|strong="G0441"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w doing|strong="G4160"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w heart|strong="G5590"\w*;

\w With|strong="G3326"\w* good \w will|strong="G2133"\w* doing \w service|strong="G1398"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w men|strong="G0444"\w*:

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G1437"\w* good \w thing|strong="G0018"\w* any \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w*, the \w same|strong="G5124"\w* shall he \w receive|strong="G2865"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \add he be\add* \w bond|strong="G1401"\w* \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w free|strong="G1658"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w ye|strong="G4160"\w* \w masters|strong="G2962"\w*, \w do|strong="G4160"\w* the same \w things|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w forbearing|strong="G0447"\w* \w threatening|strong="G0547"\w*: \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w Master|strong="G2962"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*; \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* is \w there|strong="G2076"\w* respect of \w persons|strong="G4382"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Finally|strong="G3063"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, be \w strong|strong="G1743"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w power|strong="G2904"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w might|strong="G2479"\w*.

Put \w on|strong="G1746"\w* the whole \w armour|strong="G3833"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* may be \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* the \w wiles|strong="G3180"\w* of the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2254"\w* \w wrestle|strong="G3823"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w principalities|strong="G0746"\w*, \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w powers|strong="G1849"\w*, \w agains|strong="G4314"\w*t the \w rulers|strong="G2888"\w* of the \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*, \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \w wickedness|strong="G4189"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w high|strong="G2032"\w* \add places\add*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1223"\w* take unto \w you|strong="G0353"\w* the whole \w armour|strong="G3833"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may be \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w withstand|strong="G0436"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* having \w done|strong="G2716"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w*, to \w stand|strong="G2476"\w*.

\w Stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w having|strong="G4024"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w loins|strong="G3751"\w* girt \w about|strong="G4024"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* having \w on|strong="G1746"\w* the \w breastplate|strong="G2382"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* your \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w shod|strong="G5265"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w preparation|strong="G2091"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*;

\w Above|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w taking|strong="G0353"\w* the \w shield|strong="G2375"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w wherewith|strong="G1722"\w* ye shall be \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w quench|strong="G4570"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w fiery|strong="G4448"\w* \w darts|strong="G0956"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="G4190"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w take|strong="G1209"\w* the \w helmet|strong="G4030"\w* of \w salvation|strong="G4992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sword|strong="G3162"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w word|strong="G4487"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w Praying|strong="G4336"\w* \w always|strong="G2540"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w supplication|strong="G1162"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w watching|strong="G0069"\w* \w thereunto|strong="G5124"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w perseverance|strong="G4343"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w supplication|strong="G1162"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w utterance|strong="G3056"\w* may be \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w unto|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, that I may \w open|strong="G0457"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w boldly|strong="G3954"\w*, to make \w known|strong="G1107"\w* the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*,

\w For|strong="G5228"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I am an \w ambassador|strong="G4243"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w bonds|strong="G0254"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w therein|strong="G1722"\w* I may speak \w boldly|strong="G3955"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* may \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w my|strong="G1691"\w* \w affairs|strong="G3588"\w*, \add and\add* \w how|strong="G5101"\w* I \w do|strong="G4238"\w*, \w Tychicus|strong="G5190"\w*, a \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w minister|strong="G1249"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, shall make \w known|strong="G1107"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*:

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* I have \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the same \w purpose|strong="G5124"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye might \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w affairs|strong="G4012"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* he might \w comfort|strong="G3870"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w Peace|strong="G1515"\w* \add be\add* to the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w sincerity|strong="G0861"\w*. Amen. Written from Rome unto the Ephesians by Tychicus.
